org.openimaj.text.nlp.sentiment.type

Class TFFCountSentiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.text.nlp.sentiment.type.TFFCountSentiment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BipolarSentimentProvider, DiscreteCountBipolarSentimentProvider, Sentiment, WeightedBipolarSentimentProvider

    public class TFFCountSentiment
extends Object
implements Sentiment, BipolarSentimentProvider, WeightedBipolarSentimentProvider, DiscreteCountBipolarSentimentProvider
    A Discrete count sentiment is one which a set of arbitrary sentiments are given a count in a given phrase . The sentiments hold values for counts of words considered to be one of the N sentiments provided and the total number of words the sentiment was decided against is also provided. An assumption is made that a single term can only have a single sentiment, therefore sum(sentiment_count) < total though perhaps not equal as some terms may be none of the N sentiments (stop words etc.)
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
